Room.Name: Oceancrest Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the northern rim of the large Oceancrest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Circle welcomes visitors and friends to the City of Oceancrest. The entrance to the city is located to the east of the Circle about a block away. There is a magnificent tree centered in the middle of the circle, but there appears to be no significance attached to it.
